# Complete DNS Records for Hostinger DNS Zone Editor
# Domain: cryptorafts.com
# All records ready to add - Copy and paste into Hostinger

# ========================================
# IMPORTANT: DELETE OLD MX RECORDS FIRST!
# ========================================
# Before adding new records, delete any existing MX records
# They are pointing to the wrong server

# ========================================
# RECORD 1: MX (Priority 5)
# ========================================
Type: MX
Name: @
Value: mx1.hostinger.com
Priority: 5
TTL: 14400

# ========================================
# RECORD 2: MX (Priority 10)
# ========================================
Type: MX
Name: @
Value: mx2.hostinger.com
Priority: 10
TTL: 14400

# ========================================
# RECORD 3: SPF (TXT Record)
# ========================================
Type: TXT
Name: @
Value: v=spf1 include:hostinger.com ~all
TTL: 14400

# ========================================
# RECORD 4: DKIM (TXT Record)
# ========================================
Type: TXT
Name: default._domainkey
Value: v=DKIM1; k=rsa; 
TTL: 14400

# ========================================
# STEP-BY-STEP INSTRUCTIONS:
# ========================================
# 1. Log in to Hostinger: https://hpanel.hostinger.com/
# 2. Go to: Domains â†’ DNS / Name Servers
# 3. Find: cryptorafts.com
# 4. Click: "DNS Zone Editor" or "Manage DNS"
# 5. DELETE: Any existing MX records (they're wrong)
# 6. ADD: Record 1 (MX - mx1.hostinger.com, Priority 5)
# 7. ADD: Record 2 (MX - mx2.hostinger.com, Priority 10)
# 8. ADD: Record 3 (TXT - SPF record)
# 9. ADD: Record 4 (TXT - DKIM record with the long key above)
# 10. SAVE: Click "Save" or "Add Record" for each
# 11. WAIT: 15-30 minutes for DNS propagation
# 12. VERIFY: Run .\scripts\check-dns-records.ps1
